item.title: Learn Python Decorators
item.description: Originally posted on 2020-04-03 Whether you are a beginner or an advanced programmer, there are many reasons why you should choose Python for your next coding project. Python is a scripted language with an almost stupidly simple syntax, it is easy to learn and powerful to use. One of the main reasons that I love people love Python is that it offers quite a few specific metaphors (a.k.a. paradigms) for doing certain things.
